title: Locked out of account
body: I was in a game and when i finished i got a notification saying my account was logged into another computer and it would not let me log back in, it would  not let me change my password, did they switch emails on my account? How do i get my account back? Im lvl 26 and i spent over $50 on my account and id rather not loose it. I already tried to send a ticket but I never got a response. Any suggestions? Is it possible to change my email back without logging in? Please help.

replies.body: I've edited out your account info for privacy reasons.  We can help with this!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will work with you directly with recover as well as updating information.  See you there!
